name: Buddy System (Golly Games)
description:
Controls
- WASD/Arrow keys to move
- Space Bar to collect classmates

Objective
The bell is about to ring and your friends are scattered across the school! They're terrified of bullies and need you to help them get safely out of the building so they catch the bus in time. Walk up to each of your friends and hit the space bar to get them to follow you. Just be careful you don't run into any bullies on the way!

Credits
Art - https://limezu.itch.io/moderninteriors
Music - https://opengameart.org/content/one

This is my entry for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1
